meanings.def: having the belief that some races of people are better than others or having general beliefs about other people based only on their race; showing this through violent or unfair treatment of people of other races
examples: It's a bit racist to assume I only eat Chinese food.

meanings.def: a person who believes that some races of people are better than others or who has general beliefs about other people based only on their race, and may show this in violent or unfair treatment of people of other races
examples: The family was being harassed by racists.
